QuestData.Title: Enemies At Our Door
QuestData.Description: The Zandalari have begun their attack! You must help defend the village!$b$bIf we can't push them back, we will never find the Thunder King's remains!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 10 Amani Beserkers, 5 Amani Behemoths, and 3 Gurubashi Bloodriders.
QuestData.RewardText: The Zandalari have started to retreat, $n. This victory will mean a great deal to the villagers.$b$bIn the chaos I was able to capture one of the fighters. Perhaps we can get information from him.
